hero.slogan: Building the future of sustainable space navigation using AI

tiles.headerDebrisRemoval: SPAICE is a solution for sustainability in space
tiles.paragraphDebrisRemoval: Relying on the latest advancments on AI to enable autonomous debris removal
tiles.experienceTitle: Orbital launches increase annually with a continuate tendency

products.poseEstimationHeader: Deep Learning based perception algorithms to accurately estimate the position and track the target
products.poseEstimationDescription: Suitable for cooperative and non-cooperative targets
products.navigationHeader: Exploit orbital dynamics and cutting-edge motion planning technologies to consciously navigate towards the goal
products.navigationDescription: Orbital dynamics is not a limit
products.dockingHeader: Our trained policies offer the best control strategy for multi-purpose docking
products.dockingDescription: A precise docking enables the servicing, refueling or removal of any satellite
products.onBoardHeader: Intelligent robotic manipulation solutions for on satellite operations and debris removal
products.onBoardDescription: We enlarge the lifetime of satellites by performing maintenance operations

cta.header: The beginning of a new in-orbit servicing era
cta.paragraph: We are looking for partners to join us in this journey

team.matteoBackground: Aerospace Engineer specialised in AI and ML, with a track record of experiences in fast-paced industries.
team.guillemBackground: Electronics & Computer Science Engineer, specialised in AI and ML, doctorating in Robotics manipulation.
team.nicholasBackground: Aerospace Engineer specialised in Robotics, experienced in big tech companies.
team.ronaldBackground: Associate Professor at the University of Oxford, Computer Vision researcher with strong background in 3D Computer Vision and Computer Graphics.

values.header: The potential of SPAICE enables endless applications
values.paragraph: This represents our unique value proposition

businessTechVision.businessParagraph: Autonomously identifying, approaching,  and docking in-space targets  to extend satellites' life  and remove orbiting debris
businessTechVision.technologyParagraph: AI-based end-to-end pipeline  for autonomous navigation in space, deploying the power of latest software advancement
businessTechVision.visionParagraph: Impacting space navigation  empowering the market expansion towards a more reliable and sustainable circular space mobility
